name: HorizonTD
description:
This tower defence game is well...not that towery, it's more like "spaceship defence" game where you only have a spaceship and you have to defend endless waves of enemies.

The game still has the basic elements of a classic TD game such as upgrading.

The key to defending the waves is in the right upgrade combinations and in the right positioning, as positioning can be slow and painful.

The game also focuses on realistic graphics, using the newest technologies. Thus the game can be really heavy on your PC.
NOTE: The game is cancelled because of low interest. No updates are coming.



Updatesv0.1.1.1
  • Shooting sound fixed.
Controls
  • WASD - move camera (will be changed later on)
  • Right click - move hero to click position
  • Mouse Wheel - zoom in and out
  • Ctrl + F4 - Exit game :/
